PageTitle: display bgp mdt all routing-table peer statistics
FuncDef: The display bgp mdt all routing-table peer statistics command displays the statistics of the BGP Multicast Distribution Tree (MDT) routes for specified peers in all instance.
CLIs: display bgp mdt all routing-table peer <remoteIpv4Addr> advertised-routes statistics
display bgp mdt all routing-table peer <remoteIpv4Addr> received-routes statistics
display bgp mdt all routing-table peer <remoteIpv4Addr> received-routes active statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the routes of the specified BGP peer.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays the routes advertised to a specified peer.
-

Displays the routes received from the specified peer.
-

Displays the active routes received from the specified peer.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp mdt all routing-table peer 10.1.1.1 received-routes statistics
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can specify different parameters to view the statistics of specific routing information.
